title: Open API Access for Compliance Automation
summary: As a Compliance and Risk Lead in Digital Health Application Development, I want robust API access to integrate compliance checks and monitoring tools so that I can ensure legal audit-readiness and mitigate compliance risks effectively within the development pipelines.

title: Comprehensive Developer Documentation - Step-by-Step Guides for Common Tasks
summary: As a Compliance and Risk Lead in Digital Health Application Development, I want clear and detailed documentation with step-by-step guides for integrating compliance checks and secure API designs so that I can ensure that digital health applications are built with compliance-by-design principles and reduce long-term risk.

title: Sandbox Environment for Testing
summary: As a Compliance and Risk Lead in Digital Health Application Development, I want a secure sandbox environment for app development so that I can ensure compliance-by-design principles are integrated effectively without compromising agility.

title: Security Protocols for Third-Party Applications - Compliance with Healthcare Data Regulations
summary: As a Compliance and Risk Lead in Digital Health Application Development, I want to ensure that the security protocols for third-party applications comply with healthcare data regulations, so that I can embed legal compliance and risk mitigation directly into the development process without hindering the agile delivery of applications.

title: Extensible Platform Architecture – Clear Guidelines for Extension Development
summary: As a Compliance and Risk Lead in Digital Health Application Development, I want clear guidelines for extension development so that I can ensure compliance-by-design principles are embedded in new applications without hindering the agile development process.

title: Device Integration Compliance
summary: As a Compliance and Risk Lead in Digital Health Application Development, I want robust Device Discovery and Management APIs so that I can ensure that the integration of third-party health devices complies with data privacy regulations and maintain secure interactions within the ALFRED platform.

title: Error Tracking and Reporting Tools
summary: As a Compliance and Risk Lead in Digital Health Application Development, I want robust error tracking and reporting tools integrated into the ALFRED system so that I can ensure compliance and monitor for security and policy violations in real-time across development pipelines.

title: User Consent Management Framework - Audit Trails for Consent Management
summary: As a Compliance and Risk Lead in Digital Health Application Development, I want a robust consent management system with complete audit trails for user consent so that I can ensure compliance with legal requirements and maintain traceability for all user interactions.

title: Community Support and Collaboration Features - Forums for Developer Discussions
summary: As a Compliance and Risk Lead in Digital Health Application Development, I want to have access to a dedicated forum for developer discussions so that I can facilitate compliance-related dialogues and ensure that legal requirements are effectively integrated into the development process.
